entry.source: I recorded your "favor" to the accented man as{F801}a quest. Running his extremely heavy dialect{F801}through my translation module, I got, {F804,5}"I want{F801}you to off [this means "kill"] the demon at the{F801}Metropolitan Government Office.{F804,0}"{F801}
